Lyric:
[by:yes96]
[00:18.74]Music is a world within itself
[00:22.19]With a language we all understand
[00:27.69]With an equal opportunity
[00:31.13]For all to sing, dance and clap their hands
[00:35.99]But just because a record has a groove
[00:38.24]Don't make it in the groove
[00:40.54]But you can tell right away at letter A
[00:42.96]When the people start to move
[00:45.41]
[00:46.01]They can feel it all over
[00:50.51]They can feel it all over people
[00:55.06]They can feel it all over
[00:59.62]They can feel it all over people
[01:06.67]
[01:21.66]Music knows it is and always will
[01:24.92]Be one of the things that life just won't quit
[01:30.45]But here are some of music's pioneers
[01:33.72]That time will not allow us to forget
[01:38.67]For there's Basie, Miller, Satchmo
[01:40.87]And the king of all Sir Duke
[01:43.07]And with a voice like Ella's ringing out
[01:45.66]There's no way the band can lose
[01:47.26]
[01:48.71]You can feel it all over
[01:53.25]You can feel it all over people
[01:57.59]You can feel it all over
[02:02.15]You can feel it all over people
[02:06.00]
[02:06.70]You can feel it all over
[02:11.01]You can feel it all over people
[02:15.50]You can feel it all over
[02:20.00]You can feel it all over people
[02:25.45]
[02:41.86]You can feel it all over
[02:46.30]You can feel it all over people
[02:50.71]You can feel it all over
[02:55.10]You can feel it all over people
[03:00.26]
[03:00.45]You can feel it all over
[03:03.76]You can feel it all over people
[03:08.17]You can feel it all over
[03:15.57]I can feel it all over-all over now people
[03:16.57]
[03:17.43]Can't you feel it all over
[03:21.37]Come on let's feel it all over people
[03:25.88]You can feel it all over
[03:30.08]Everybody-all over people
